meta-runner.name: Analysis:: Whitesouce scanner
meta-runner.description: Up-/down- scales resources at Azure to save on costs

param.name: nuget.name
param.spec: text description='Nuget package name' display='hidden' readOnly='true'

param.name: wssScanner.forceDownload
param.spec: select data_2='True' data_1='False' display='normal' label='Force scanner redownload? ' description='If set to True, scanner will be redownloaded on each run; otherwise - it will be redownloaded if it is 15 days old.'

param.name: wssScanner.scannerTargetPath
param.spec: text label='Download scanner to ' description='If not specified - scanner will be downloaded to temp folder on agent.' display='normal'

param.name: wssScanner.projectConfig
param.spec: text label='Project WSS configuration ' description='If not specified - default configuration will be used.' display='normal'

param.name: wssScanner.projectName
param.spec: text label='Project name for WSS ' description='Shall be specified, if there is no WSS config for this project' display='normal'

param.name: wssScanner.version
param.spec: text label='Project version for WSS ' description='Specified project version' display='normal' validationMode='not_empty'

param.name: wssScanner.scanPattern
param.spec: text label='File scan pattern ' description='Comma, space or line separated list of Ant-style GLOB patterns specifying which files to include in the scan.' display='normal'

param.name: wssScanner.apiKey
param.spec: password label='API Key for WSS ' description='API key' display='normal' validationMode='not_empty'

param.name: wssScanner.scanPath
param.spec: text label='Scan path ' description='' display='normal' validationMode='not_empty'
